snippet: The scale of success of Narendra Modi, a Hindu nationalist, depends in part on whether he can persuade Muslims to support his candidacy, a difficult challenge.
abstract: Success of Narendra Modi in India's national election depends on whether his Bharatiya Janata Party can win in the state of Uttar Pradesh; in turn, this means that Modi must persuade Muslims to support his candidacy, difficult challenge given that the BJP's relationship with Muslims has been fraught.

byline.contributor: Hari Kumar and Sonia Paul contributed reporting from Lucknow, and Ellen Barry from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: The scale of success of Narendra Modi, a Hindu nationalist, depends in part on whether he can persuade Muslims to support his candidacy, a difficult challenge.

headline.main: India’s Muslims Wary of Rising Political Star
headline.print_headline: India’s Muslims Wary of Rising Political Star
